languages.text: "А после он совершил святотатство... Похитил реликвию, разбил саркофаг! Простите, Ваша Светлость, я не смог уберечь святыню, прах ваших почтенных предков!"

traits.locale_text: "А после он совершил святотатство... Похитил реликвию, разбил саркофаг! Простите, Ваша Светлость, я не смог уберечь святыню, прах ваших почтенных предков!"

languages.text: "And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"
languages.original_text: "А после он совершил святотатство... Похитил реликвию, разбил саркофаг! Простите, Ваша Светлость, я не смог уберечь святыню, прах ваших почтенных предков!"

traits.locale_text: "And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"
"And then he committed sacrilege... By stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I failed to preserve the hallowed remains of your ancestors!"
"And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"
"And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the hallowed remains of your ancestors!"
"And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"
"And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"
"And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"
"And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"

languages.text: "Und dann beging er ein Sakrileg ... indem er das Relikt stahl und den Sarcophagus zerstörte! Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich konnte die heilige Asche Eurer Ahnen nicht schützen!"
languages.original_text: "And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"

traits.locale_text: "Und dann beging er ein Sakrileg ... indem er das Relikt stahl und den Sarcophagus zerstörte! Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich konnte die heiligen Überreste Eurer Ahnen nicht schützen!"

languages.text: «Y después cometió sacrilegio... ¡robando la reliquia y destrozando el sarcófago! Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¡No he sido capaz de preservar las cenizas sagradas de sus venerables antepasados!».
languages.original_text: "And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"

traits.locale_text: «Y después cometió sacrilegio... ¡robando la reliquia y destrozando el sarcófago! Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¡No he sido capaz de preservar los restos sagrados de sus venerables antepasados!».

languages.text: 「そして聖遺物を盗み、棺を砕くという冒涜を犯した！お許しください、陛下。神聖なるご先祖様のご遺灰をお守りすることができませんでした！」
languages.original_text: "And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"

traits.locale_text: 「そして聖遺物を盗み、棺を砕くという冒涜を犯した！お許しください、陛下。神聖なるご先祖様のご遺骨をお守りすることができませんでした！」

languages.text: “之后他犯下了亵渎的重罪……他抢走了圣物，破坏了棺柩！原谅我，大人，我没能保护好您列位先祖的圣灰！”
languages.original_text: "And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"

traits.locale_text: “之后他犯下了亵渎的重罪……他抢走了圣物，打碎了棺柩！原谅我，大人，我没能保护好您列位先祖的神圣遗骸！”

languages.text: « C'est alors qu'il a commis le sacrilège suprême... en forçant le sarcophage et en volant la relique ! Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie. Je n'ai pas su protéger les cendres sacrées de vos ancêtres ! »
languages.original_text: "And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est alors qu'il a commis le sacrilège suprême... en forçant le sarcophage et en volant la relique ! Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie. Je n'ai pas su protéger les restes sacrés de vos ancêtres ! »

languages.text: "Ardından da kutsala saygısızlık eyleminde bulundu. Yadigârı çaldı ve lahdi paramparça etti! Beni affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Atalarınızın kutsal küllerini korumayı başaramadım!"
languages.original_text: "And then he committed sacrilege... by stealing the relic and shattering the sarcophagus! Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I have failed to preserve the sacred ashes of your ancestors!"
